en.volumes_should_not_less_than_type_summar: The total number of volumes cannot be less than the sum of all types of volumes
en.gigabytes_should_not_less_than_type_summ: The total gigabytes of volumes cannot be less than the sum of all types of volumes
en.snapshots_should_not_less_than_type_summ: The total number of volume's snapshots cannot be less than the sum of all types of volume's snapshots

zh-CN.volumes_should_not_less_than_type_summar: 云硬盘总数不得少于所有云硬盘类型的数量之和。
zh-CN.gigabytes_should_not_less_than_type_summ: 云硬盘容量总数不得少于所有云硬盘类型的容量的数量之和。
zh-CN.snapshots_should_not_less_than_type_summ: 云硬盘快照总数不得少于所有云硬盘类型的快照数量之和。
